00036 eolFile *eol_loader_read_file_binary(char *filename)
00037 {
00038   eolFile *file;
00039   if (!_eol_loader_initialized)
00040   {
00041     eol_logger_message(
00042         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00043         "eol_loader: not initialized\n"
00044       );
00045     return NULL;
00046   }
00047   if (filename == NULL)
00048   {
00049     eol_logger_message(
00050         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00051         "eol_loader: passed NULL data to load from object\n"
00052       );
00053     return NULL;
00054   }
00055   file = (eolFile *)malloc(sizeof(eolFile));
00056   if (file == NULL)
00057   {
00058     eol_logger_message(
00059         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00060         "eol_loader: unable to allocate eolFile handle\n"
00061       );
00062     return NULL;
00063   }
00064   memset(file,0,sizeof(eolFile));
00065   
00066   file->_PSfile = PHYSFS_openRead(filename);
00067   if(file->_PSfile == NULL)
00068   {
00069     eol_logger_message(
00070         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00071         "eol_loader:Unable to open file %s!\n",
00072         filename);
00073     free(file);
00074     return NULL;
00075   }
00076   file->_fileMode = eolLoaderReadBinary;
00077   eol_line_cpy(file->filename,filename);
00078   eol_loader_read_uint_from_file((eolUint *)&file->_fileEndian,file);
00079   return file;
00080 }

00082 eolFile *eol_loader_write_file_binary(char *filename)
00083 {
00084   eolFile *file;
00085   if (!_eol_loader_initialized)
00086   {
00087     eol_logger_message(
00088         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00089         "eol_loader: not initialized\n"
00090       );
00091     return NULL;

00093   if (filename == NULL)
00094   {
00095     eol_logger_message(
00096         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00097         "eol_loader: passed NULL data to load from object\n"
00098       );
00099     return NULL;
00100   }
00101   file = (eolFile *)malloc(sizeof(eolFile));
00102   if (file == NULL)
00103   {
00104     eol_logger_message(
00105         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00106         "eol_loader: unable to allocate eolFile handle\n"
00107       );
00108     return NULL;
00109   }
00110   memset(file,0,sizeof(eolFile));
00111 
00112   file->_PSfile = PHYSFS_openWrite(filename);
00113   if(file->_PSfile == NULL)
00114   {
00115     eol_logger_message(
00116         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00117         "eol_loader:Unable to open file %s!\n",
00118         filename);
00119     free(file);
00120     return NULL;
00121   }
00122   file->_fileMode = eolLoaderWriteBinary;
00123   eol_line_cpy(file->filename,filename);
00124   eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(file,EOLFILEENDIAN);
00125   file->_fileEndian = EOLFILEENDIAN;
00126   return file;
00127 }

00129 eolFile *eol_loader_read_file(char *filename)
00130 {
00131   eolFile *file;
00132   if (!_eol_loader_initialized)
00133   {
00134     eol_logger_message(
00135         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00136         "eol_loader: not initialized\n"
00137       );
00138     return NULL;
00139   }
00140   if (filename == NULL)
00141   {
00142     eol_logger_message(
00143         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00144         "eol_loader: passed NULL data to load from object\n"
00145       );
00146     return NULL;
00147   }
00148   file = (eolFile *)malloc(sizeof(eolFile));
00149   if (file == NULL)
00150   {
00151     eol_logger_message(
00152         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00153         "eol_loader: unable to allocate eolFile handle\n"
00154       );
00155     return NULL;
00156   }
00157 
00158   memset(file,0,sizeof(eolFile));
00159   file->_PSfile = PHYSFS_openRead(filename);
00160   if(file->_PSfile == NULL)
00161   {
00162     eol_logger_message(
00163         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00164         "eol_loader:Unable to open file %s!\n",
00165         filename);
00166     free(file);
00167     return NULL;
00168   }
00169   file->size = PHYSFS_fileLength(file->_PSfile);
00170   file->_buffer = (char *)malloc(file->size);
00171   if(file->_buffer == NULL)
00172   {
00173     eol_logger_message(
00174         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00175         "eol_loader:Unable to allocate space for %s file reading!\n",
00176         filename);
00177     PHYSFS_close(file->_PSfile);
00178     free(file);
00179     return NULL;
00180   }
00181   PHYSFS_read(file->_PSfile, file->_buffer, file->size, 1);
00182   file->file = fmemopen (file->_buffer, file->size, "r");
00183 
00184   if (!file->file)
00185   {
00186     eol_logger_message(
00187         EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00188         "eol_loader: failed to open file: %s\n",
00189         filename);
00190     PHYSFS_close(file->_PSfile);
00191     free(file->_buffer);
00192     free(file);
00193     return NULL;
00194   }
00195   file->_fileMode = eolLoaderRead;
00196   eol_line_cpy(file->filename,filename);
00197   return file;
00198 }

00200 void eol_loader_close_file(eolFile **file)
00201 {
00202   if ((!file) ||
00203      (!*file))
00204   {
00205     return;
00206   }
00207   if ((*file)->file != NULL)
00208     fclose((*file)->file);
00209   if ((*file)->_PSfile != NULL)
00210     PHYSFS_close((*file)->_PSfile);
00211   if ((*file)->_buffer != NULL)
00212     free((*file)->_buffer);
00213   *file = NULL;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(eolFile *file,eolUint data)
00217 {
00218   if (!file)return;
00219   if (file->_fileMode != eolLoaderWriteBinary)
00220   {
00221     eol_logger_message(
00222       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00223       "eol_loader:file not opened for writing\n");
00224     return;
00225   }
00226   if (file->_fileEndian == EOLFILELISTTLEENDIAN)
00227   {
00228     PHYSFS_writeULE32(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint32) data);
00229   }
00230   else
00231   {
00232     PHYSFS_writeUBE32(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint32) data);
00233   }
00234 }

00256 void eol_loader_write_line_to_file(eolFile *file,eolLine data)
00257 {
00258   int i;
00259   if (!file)return;
00260   if (file->_fileMode != eolLoaderWriteBinary)
00261   {
00262     eol_logger_message(
00263       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00264       "eol_loader:file not opened for writing\n");
00265     return;
00266   }
00267   for (i = 0;i < EOLLINELEN;i++)
00268   {
00269     if (file->_fileEndian == EOLFILELISTTLEENDIAN)
00270     {
00271       PHYSFS_writeULE16(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint16) data[i]);
00272     }
00273     else
00274     {
00275       PHYSFS_writeUBE16(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint16) data[i]);
00276     }
00277   }

00280 void eol_loader_write_string_to_file(eolFile *file,char * data)
00281 {
00282   int i;
00283   eolUint len;
00284   if ((!file) || (!data))return;
00285   if (file->_fileMode != eolLoaderWriteBinary)
00286   {
00287     eol_logger_message(
00288       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00289       "eol_loader:file not opened for writing\n");
00290     return;
00291   }
00292   len = strlen(data);
00293   /*prepend string lenth*/
00294   eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(file,len);
00295   for (i = 0;i < len;i++)
00296   {
00297     if (file->_fileEndian == EOLFILELISTTLEENDIAN)
00298     {
00299       PHYSFS_writeULE16(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint16) data[i]);
00300     }
00301     else
00302     {
00303       PHYSFS_writeUBE16(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint16) data[i]);
00304     }
00305   }
00306 }

00308 void eol_loader_read_uint_from_file(eolUint * data, eolFile *file)
00309 {
00310   if ((!file) || (!data))return;
00311   if (file->_fileMode != eolLoaderReadBinary)
00312   {
00313     eol_logger_message(
00314       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00315       "eol_loader:file %s not opened for reading in binary\n",
00316       file->filename);
00317     return;
00318   }
00319   if (file->_fileEndian == EOLFILELISTTLEENDIAN)
00320   {
00321     PHYSFS_readULE32(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint32 *)data);
00322   }
00323   else
00324   {
00325     PHYSFS_readUBE32(file->_PSfile, (PHYSFS_uint32 *)data);
00326   }
00327 }

00338      return;

00350 void eol_loader_read_string_from_file(char ** data, eolFile *file)
00351 {
00352   eolUint len = 0;
00353   int i;
00354   PHYSFS_uint16 temp;
00355   if ((!file) || (!data))return;
00356   if (file->_fileMode != eolLoaderReadBinary)
00357   {
00358     eol_logger_message(
00359       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00360       "eol_loader:file %s not opened for reading in binary\n",
00361       file->filename);
00362     return;
00363   }
00364   /*get prepend string lenth*/
00365   eol_loader_read_uint_from_file(&len, file);
00366   if (len == 0)
00367   {
00368     eol_logger_message(
00369       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00370       "eol_loader:expected string from file: %s, has zero length.\n",
00371       file->filename);
00372     return;
00373   }
00374   if (*data == NULL)  /*otherwise assume its safe to write to*/
00375   {
00376     *data = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*(len + 1));
00377     if (*data == NULL)
00378     {
00379       eol_logger_message(
00380         EOL_LOG_INFO,
00381         "eol_loader:failed to allocate string buffer for reading from file %s.\n",
00382         file->filename);
00383       return;
00384     }
00385   }
00386   for (i = 0; i < len;i++)
00387   {
00388     if (file->_fileEndian == EOLFILELISTTLEENDIAN)
00389     {
00390       PHYSFS_readULE16(file->_PSfile, &temp);
00391     }
00392     else
00393     {
00394       PHYSFS_readUBE16(file->_PSfile, &temp);
00395     }
00396     (*data)[i] = (char)temp;
00397   }
00398   (*data)[len] = '\0';
00399 }

00401 /*saving and loading:*/
00402 
00403 void eol_loader_write_keychain_hash(eolKeychain *link,eolFile *file)
00404 {
00405   GList *keys = NULL;
00406   GList *values = NULL;
00407   if (!link)return;
00408   if (link->keyType != eolKeychainHash)return;
00409   /*
00410   type
00411   count
00412   key
00413   value - expand for keychain type
00414   key
00415   value
00416   ...
00417   */
00418   eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(file,link->keyType);
00419   eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(file,link->itemCount);
00420   keys = g_hash_table_get_keys((GHashTable*)link->keyValue);
00421   values = g_hash_table_get_values((GHashTable*)link->keyValue);
00422   for (;(keys != NULL) && (values != NULL); keys = keys->next,values = values->next)
00423   {
00424     eol_loader_write_string_to_file(file,(char *)keys->data);
00425     eol_loader_write_keychain_link((eolKeychain *)values->data,file);
00426   }
00427 }
00428 
00429 void eol_loader_write_keychain_list(eolKeychain *link,eolFile *file)
00430 {
00431   GList *it;
00432   if (!link)return;
00433   if (link->keyType != eolKeychainList)return;
00434   eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(file,link->keyType);
00435   eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(file,link->itemCount);
00436   for (it = (GList *)link->keyValue;it != NULL;it = it->next)
00437   {
00438     eol_loader_write_keychain_link(it->data,file);
00439   }
00440 }
00441 
00442 void eol_loader_write_keychain_string(eolKeychain *link,eolFile *file)
00443 {
00444   if (!link)return;
00445   if (link->keyType != eolKeychainString)return;
00446   /*
00447   type
00448   string (which is len,chars)
00449   */
00450   eol_loader_write_uint_to_file(file,link->keyType);
00451   eol_loader_write_string_to_file(file,link->keyValue);
00452 }
00453 
00454 void eol_loader_write_keychain_link(eolKeychain *link,eolFile *file)
00455 {
00456   if ((!link) || (!file))return;
00457   switch(link->keyType)
00458   {
00459     case eolKeychainString:
00460       eol_loader_write_keychain_string(link,file);
00461       break;
00462     case eolKeychainList:
00463       eol_loader_write_keychain_list(link,file);
00464       break;
00465     case eolKeychainHash:
00466       eol_loader_write_keychain_hash(link,file);
00467       break;
00468     default:
00469       eol_logger_message(
00470         EOL_LOG_WARN,
00471         "eol_loader:unsupported keychain type for writing: %i\n",
00472         link->keyType);
00473   }
00474 }
00475 
00476 void eol_loader_keychain_save(eolKeychain *chain, char *filename)
00477 {
00478   eolFile *file;
00479   if ((!chain) || (!filename))return;
00480   file = eol_loader_write_file_binary(filename);
00481   if (file != NULL)
00482   {
00483     eol_loader_write_keychain_link(chain,file);
00484     eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00485   }
00486 }
00487 /*
00488 *** loading from file ***
00489 */
00490 
00491 eolKeychain *eol_loader_read_keychain_hash(eolFile *file)
00492 {
00493   int i;
00494   char * buffer = NULL;  /*all keys should be limited to an eolLine*/
00495   eolKeychain *link = NULL;
00496   eolUint itemCount = 0;
00497   /*
00498   count
00499   key
00500   value - expand for keychain type
00501   key
00502   value
00503   ...
00504   */
00505   eol_loader_read_uint_from_file(&itemCount,file);
00506   if (itemCount == 0)return NULL;
00507   link = eol_keychain_new_hash();
00508   if (link == NULL)return NULL;
00509   for (i= 0;i < itemCount; i++)
00510   {
00511     if (buffer != NULL)
00512     {
00513       free(buffer);
00514       buffer = NULL;
00515     }
00516     eol_loader_read_string_from_file(&buffer,file);
00517     if (strlen(buffer) == 0)
00518     {
00519       eol_logger_message(
00520         EOL_LOG_WARN,
00521         "eol_loader:missing hash key in file: %s\nexpected %i keys, failed on %i\n",
00522         file->filename,
00523         itemCount,
00524         i);
00525       return link;
00526     }
00527     eol_keychain_hash_insert(link,buffer,eol_loader_read_keychain_link(file));
00528   }
00529   return link;
00530 }
00531 
00532 eolKeychain *eol_loader_read_keychain_list(eolFile *file)
00533 {
00534   int i;
00535   eolKeychain *link = NULL;
00536   eolUint itemCount = 0;
00537   eol_loader_read_uint_from_file(&itemCount,file);
00538   if (!itemCount)return NULL;
00539   link = eol_keychain_new_list();
00540   if (link == NULL)return NULL;
00541   for (i = 0;i < itemCount;i++)
00542   {
00543     eol_keychain_list_append(link,eol_loader_read_keychain_link(file));
00544   }
00545   return link;
00546 }
00547 
00548 eolKeychain *eol_loader_read_keychain_string(eolFile *file)
00549 {
00550   eolKeychain * link = NULL;
00551   char *buffer = NULL;
00552   eol_loader_read_string_from_file((char **)&buffer,file);
00553   if ((buffer == NULL) || (strlen(buffer) == 0))return NULL;
00554   link = eol_keychain_new_string(buffer);
00555   free(buffer);
00556   return link;
00557 }
00558 
00559 eolKeychain *eol_loader_read_keychain_link(eolFile *file)
00560 {
00561   eolUint newtype = 0;
00562   if (!file)return NULL;
00563   eol_loader_read_uint_from_file(&newtype,file);
00564   switch(newtype)
00565   {
00566     case eolKeychainString:
00567       return eol_loader_read_keychain_string(file);
00568     case eolKeychainHash:
00569       return eol_loader_read_keychain_hash(file);
00570     case eolKeychainList:
00571       return eol_loader_read_keychain_list(file);
00572     default:
00573       eol_logger_message(
00574         EOL_LOG_WARN,
00575         "eol_loader:unsupported keychain type for reading: %i\n",
00576         newtype);
00577   }
00578   return NULL;
00579 }
00580 
00581 void eol_loader_keychain_load_from_file(eolKeychain **chain, char *filename)
00582 {
00583   eolFile *file;
00584   if ((!chain) || (!filename))return;
00585   file = eol_loader_read_file_binary(filename);
00586   if (file != NULL)
00587   {
00588     *chain = eol_loader_read_keychain_link(file);
00589     eol_loader_close_file(&file);
00590   }
00591 }
